channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Editorial Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Editorial Calendar

item.title: CVE-2022-4115|2024-08-03T01:27:54.445Z -- unknown -- editorial%20calendar
item.description: The Editorial Calendar WordPress plugin before 3.8.3 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing users with roles as low as contributor to inject arbitrary web scripts in the plugin admin panel, enabling a Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability targeting higher privileged users.
